definition[0]: if one part of something splits off from the rest, it becomes completely separate from it
example[0]: A huge lump of rock had split off from the cliff face.
definition[1]: if a small group of people split off from a larger group, they become separate from it
example[1]: The group split away from the Green Party and formed the Environmental Alliance.
definition[2]: to separate one part of something and make it completely separate from the rest
example[2]: This part of the business has now been split off from the main company.
